thread.title: SBS Group Expands CRM Practice with Infinity Info Systems Acquisition
thread.title_full: SBS Group Expands CRM Practice with Infinity Info Systems Acquisition - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SBS Group Expands CRM Practice with Infinity Info Systems Acquisition
text:
SBS Group, a leading technology consulting firm and Microsoft Master VAR, announced today its acquisition of certain assets of Infinity Systems, a prominent Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Infor CRM partner headquartered in New York City.
Edison, NJ (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
SBS Group, a leading technology consulting firm and Microsoft Master VAR, announced today its acquisition of certain assets of Infinity Systems, a prominent Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Infor CRM partner headquartered in New York City. SBS Group provides business and technology solutions, including ERP, CRM, Business Intelligence, Cloud and Infrastructure services, to mid-sized and enterprise companies through a network of regional offices across North America. Infinity Info Systems is an award-winning consulting and services firm specializing in CRM solutions for national and global companies in industries ranging from manufacturing to financial services.
The Infinity Info Systems acquisition significantly enhances SBS Group's existing capabilities in the CRM market space. James R. Bowman, Jr., President and CEO of SBS Group commented on the value that Infinity will bring to the SBS Group and their customers, "The continued growth of CRM as a mission critical software platform to deliver exceptional customer experiences in areas like social marketing, system integration, and call center support. The addition of the Infinity team expands our depth and breadth of CRM services and strengthens our ability to drive even more value to our client family. The Infinity team provides a depth of industry and functional expertise to help us grow our world class CRM team to complement our industry leading ERP, Cloud, Infrastructure, and Business Intelligence practices."
Since inception in 1987, Infinity has received numerous industry and client awards related to the implementation and support of over 3,500 solutions and training of more than 130,000 professionals globally. Infinity's industry technology solutions, services, training and support help organizations improve sales, marketing and customer service effectiveness and leverage business intelligence how, when and where they need it. Matt Hall, COO of Infinity Info Systems, states, "The entire Infinity Info Systems team is very excited to become a part of SBS Group. As a leader in the Microsoft Dynamics ERP space and nationwide solution provider, SBS Group offers our team the opportunity to work with new customers across the country to take their marketing, sales and customer service organizations to the next level."
The Infinity Info Systems CRM Practice will operate as a corporate division of SBS Group with careful attention given to supporting and leveraging the unique characteristics that have enabled its success to date.
About Infinity Info Systems
Infinity Info Systems is an award winning consulting and services firm specializing Microsoft Dynamics CRM for national and global companies in industries ranging from manufacturing to financial services. Infinity is a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner in Customer Relationship Management. Ongoing support is provided through service packages designed to give clients access to scalable IT resources and training. Founded in 1987, clients range from mid-size to multinational Fortune 500 corporations.
About SBS Group
SBS Group is a national Microsoft master VAR (Value Added Reseller) with Gold level competency in enterprise resource planning (ERP) and customer relationship management (CRM). Over the past 25 years, they have been recognized as Microsoft Partner of the Year, Inner Circle Member and Microsoft President's Club member multiple times. The company is headquartered in Edison, New Jersey and operates offices across North America. For more information, please visit SBS Group's website at http://www.sbsgroupusa.com . Follow us on LinkedIn at http://www.linkedin.com/company/sbs-group , on Twitter at http://www.twitter.com/sbsgroup and find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/SBSGroupUSA .
